mapper.select: SELECT clss_Id, mngr_Id, cmpy_Id, clss_Nm, clss_Content, limit_Cnt, aply_Start_Dt, aply_End_Dt, clss_Start_Dd, clss_End_Dd, set_In_Tm, set_Out_Tm, cmcd_nm as clss_Cd, clss_Adr, clss_Total_Tm, file_Id, clss_Etc FROM clss JOIN cmcd m ON clss.clss_cd = m.cmcd_id WHERE mngr_id = #{mngrId}
SELECT COUNT(stdt_id) FROM aply WHERE clss_id = #{clss_id}
SELECT COUNT(stdt_id) FROM rgst WHERE clss_id = #{clss_id}
SELECT cmcd_nm FROM cmcd WHERE tpcd_id = 'GRP0002'

SELECT clss_id AS clssId, clss_nm AS clssNm, aply_start_dt AS aplyStartDt, aply_end_dt AS aplyEndDt, clss_start_dd AS clssStartDd, clss_end_dd AS clssEndDd, clss_adr AS clssAdr, set_in_tm AS setInTm, set_out_tm AS setOutTm, limit_cnt AS limitCnt, substr(clss_cd,-3,3) AS clssCd, clss_content AS clssContent, mngr.mngr_Nm AS mngrId FROM clss JOIN mngr ON mngr.mngr_id=clss.mngr_id WHERE clss_id= #{clssId}
select file_id from flup WHERE post_id=#{clssId}
select file_id AS fileId, post_id AS postId, file_Nm AS fileNm, file_content AS fileContent, file_size AS fileSize, file_type AS fileType from flup WHERE file_id=#{fileId}

SELECT s.stdt_nm AS stdtNm, s.birth_dd AS birthDd, s.stdt_email AS stdtEmail, s.stdt_tel AS stdtTel, c.cmcd_nm AS genderCd, c2.cmcd_nm AS stdtCd FROM rgst r JOIN stdt s ON s.stdt_id=r.stdt_id JOIN cmcd c ON c.tpcd_id||c.cmcd_id=s.gender_cd JOIN cmcd c2 ON c2.tpcd_id||c2.cmcd_id=r.rgst_cd WHERE clss_id = #{clssId}
SELECT clss_id clssId, clss_nm clssNm FROM clss WHERE mngr_id = #{mngrId} ORDER BY clss_Nm
